description.en: Enables your Homey to handle concurrency better to prevent racing conditions

hint.en: Waits until the semaphore is unlocked and then locks it. As soon as this was successfull the card returns 'true'. If the semaphore is locked for more than 3 seconds further attempts are canceled and this card returns 'false'.
